parameter.name: DatabaseServer
parameter.description: Name of the server that hosts the application database. Must match the server specified in the connection string.

parameter.name: DatabaseName
parameter.description: Name of the application database. Must match the database specified in the connection string.

parameter.name: DatabaseUserName
parameter.description: User name that the application will use to connect to the application database.

parameter.name: DatabaseUserPassword
parameter.description: Password for the database user name.

parameter.name: Application Administrator User Name
parameter.description: The user name of the user that will define users and roles in the application.

parameter.name: Application Administrator Full Name
parameter.description: The full name of the user that will define users and roles in the application.

parameter.name: Application Administrator Password
parameter.description: The password of the user that will define users and roles in the application.
